title: Helpful and useful!
text:
So this app has actually been really cool. I highly encourage y‚Äôall to check it out. It‚Äôs basically local restaurants and smaller grocery stores putting together surprise bags of their food for super cheap. It can be hit or miss if you‚Äôre a super picky eater but otherwise it‚Äôs a fantastic deal and helps cut down on food waste. I‚Äôve gotten a lot of use out of it in DFW.

Edit after using it for a while. 

This app has still been extremely helpful and most definitely holds its value as far as I an concerned. Especially for people like me who enjoy Indian food and Tiff‚Äôs treats leftovers!

title: More choices
text: Need more vendors.

title: Inflation destroying your wallet? Solution to takeout.
text: For five or six bucks you get to have your meals prepared for the next two days if you spaced them out properly. if you have an aversion to cooking or simply want to help make a different climate wise, while getting delicious food, the solution right here is perfect.

title: First time using too good to go was a great experience!
text: I was so excited about getting a mystery box from Mr moto pizza. It was fast and easy. The staff was very friendly and the mystery box handoff did not disappoint. I‚Äôm definitely going to do this again.

title: This app is a great idea
text: I give this five stars because I‚Äôm very big into not wasting food, and when I found out about this app, it is a great idea and concept, and not to mention feeding people and minimizing waste and all for a very reasonable price. However I do wish that more restaurants and or deli/caf√©s would jump on board. Although I like pizzas and bagels it would be nice to see other restaurants or at least more choices. Either way I am grateful and appreciate this apps existence üëçüèºüëçüèº

title: Worth every penny
text: So far every meal I have purchased has been delicious and worth the money . It has been fun trying new places that I may have not have tried otherwise and sampling different foods to see what I would enjoy .

title: This is fun and great for us want to save things
text: I always get excited to see the surprise bags even if I don‚Äôt use everything I share with friends and family we have gotten so many great things. Also helpful when you want to bring something to someplace to share. I feel good that this stuff is not going to waste.

title: I love this app
text:
I‚Äôve been to stores/restaurants I‚Äôd never been to before.  Great value, great food!
One function I wish this app had was to notify me when one of my favorites has an offer. They‚Äôll randomly offer a surprise bag thru the day and I‚Äôll miss it.

title: Money saving app
text: This app for all those non-picky eaters out there, I‚Äôve been able to feed me and my entire family of 4 for 10 bucks which I‚Äôm this economy is a rare thing to come by. Download this app asap.

title: Best in major cities or when traveling
text:
Living in Atlanta, I‚Äôve only found bakeries on here, but when I travel to NY or Paris it‚Äôs great! I‚Äôve gotten groceries and meals. It can be hit or miss, but I‚Äôve almost always been happy considering the price (check out their subreddit for examples). It‚Äôs been a fun way to try new foods while saving money as well.
Also probably best if you don‚Äôt have food restrictions

title: Best deal in town!!!!
text: If you are hungry, but just don‚Äôt have enough $,  fear not! Too good to go has the best deals in town to assure that you & your family will be well-fed at a truly discounted price. It also assures that perfectly good food will not be thrown out. A win-win for families & the community!

title: Good‚Ä¶ less expensive‚Ä¶ good options‚Ä¶ well YES!!
text: I‚Äôve found new local restaurants and old favorite spots. I am able to grab a variety of meals and sides, but mostly pastries at great rates!  And I‚Äôm able to feel good about the rates because it is assisting in preventing food waste!  My co-workers love the extra pastries!!!

title: Good value for money
text:
I found out about this app through a YouTuber and I wanted to try it out. I was hoping to get some pastries from a bakery near my house, but since you don‚Äôt know what you‚Äôll get, it‚Äôll be a surprise. I did get two bags of dutch crunch breads that I like. It was 8 pieces, one big loaf of uncut bread and one round sourdough bread. That is a steal for $5.99.
I will continue to use this app and I have already told friends and family about it.

title: TGTG
text: Great idea in saving food. Saves money for the buyer and less waste of food from the seller. Win-win. I hope more establishments will join.

title: Great food
text: There was a lot of fresh delicious food. They also have sandwiches other deli items not just sushi. The staff was so very friendly and helpful. Will start going here more often! Laura

title: Peach Cobbler Factory
text: Holy sweet deliciousness!!! Highly recommend this place to satisfy your sweet tooth cravings! A give it a big fat YUM!!

title: Our Favorite Pizza Spot!
text: Our favorite pizza spot regardless! We were so happy to find 3 specialty slices in our box! What a steal!!! We will absolutely use toogoodtogo again and definitely order from Pizza Prince!!! Pizza Prince!!!

title: Great app!!! Great food!
text: Who would not want fresh delicious surplus food at a very low rate that would otherwise go to waste at the end of the day. I hope more restaurants in my area participate!!!

title: Yay!! Preventing Food Waste!
text:
I love this app! Too Good to Go was such a great idea to combat food waste. This app is especially useful for folks like myself who are on tight budgets. 

Thanks!

title: So much fun!
text: Just heard about this app from my son. Had nothing prepared for dinner. Looked at app and found a great deal from bagel chalet. Never used this app before. Got home and opened the VERY heavy bag. It was like a treasure hunt! So much fun! Everything was delish!

title: excellent deals
text: i love that my local places are here but am excited when i see new places to try

title: Fun app
text: I have used the app 2 times. The food was exceptional, service great and good value.  My favorite food app!

title: Too good too go is great
text: Best app I‚Äôve ever used!!! Great food and unbelievable prices.  Highly recommend.

title: First timer
text: I did 3 pick ups today for my first time cause I was curious. I did a surprise bag pizza place(3 corners)(7$) it was a dope white pizza with a slice of s‚Äômores pizza. And it was huge. Then a pick up of pork bones from Spain Restaurant, my GM makes broth from it and it was $5 and we got a good amount. and last but not least a surprise bag from Dolce($7.51) it was a choice between beef bulgogi or chicken bowl. And. I LOVE BULGOGI!!!!!! All in Tampa. It‚Äôs amazing quality, cheap prices, an awesome concept, friendly staff. Whoever came up with this is a geniusüëèüèΩüëèüèΩüëèüèΩ I was very pleased with my purchases.
